title: Photography Forums
content:
Can anyone recommend a good photography forum?

The ones I’ve found so far (such as photo.net) seem to have a lot emphasis on the technical aspects of photography, to the expense of the “art” side.  
I percieve the readership of this forum to be technically strong, but also with a great sense of design. So I’m looking for a photography forum of a similar veign.

Any ideas?

 [‹ Relationship between Headers/Indent/body in a magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080322020938/http:/typophile.com/node/37741 "Go to previous forum topic") [Web standard font to go with Chaparral ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080322020938/http:/typophile.com/node/38012 "Go to next forum topic")
author: daikw

comments.content: Adobe used to have some nice forums, but a recent redesign has ruined them (for me at least). Since you don’t have the experience of them when they were faster and more useful, you might not mind. The Photoshop forums (one each for Mac and Win) and the Photography forum might cover what you want.
